definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
nail/to follow closely/to keep at sb (to do sth)/variant of 盯[ding1]
to join things together by fixing them in place at one or more points/to nail/to pin/to staple/to sew on

sentences.english: Cut the dowel down to 20cm in length.
sentences.chinese: 削減木釘，以20釐米的長度。

sentences.english: Let me start by saying, I'm a square peg.
sentences.chinese: 讓我以這句話開頭吧，我是一根方木釘。

sentences.english: He hung his coat on the wooden peg.
The combination of the frame parts should basically be made by wood dowel attachment or by tenons and glue.
sentences.chinese: 框架部分的連接處應該以木釘或者木榫膠水等方式。

sentences.english: He inserted the wooden peg into the hole.
Hang your coat on the peg in the wall.
sentences.chinese: 把大衣掛在牆上的木釘上。

sentences.english: I took off my coat and hung it on the peg.
sentences.chinese: 我脫下我的外衣並把它掛在木釘上。
